code:
graph TB
    %% External Threats
    Attacker[Security_OAuth2]
    
    %% First Line of Defense
    Attacker --> WAF[Security_IntrusionDetection]
    
    %% CDN Security
    WAF --> CloudFront[Security_OAuth2]
    
    %% Load Balancer Security
    CloudFront --> ALB[Security_Encryption]
    
    %% Application Security Layers
    ALB --> SecurityMiddleware[Security_Firewall]
    
    SecurityMiddleware --> InputValidation[Security_Firewall]
    
    InputValidation --> Authentication[Security_ZeroTrust]
    
    %% API Security
    Authentication --> APIGateway[Security_ZeroTrust]
    
    %% Data Protection
    APIGateway --> DataEncryption[Security_OAuth2]
    
    %% Storage Security
    DataEncryption --> S3Security[Security_ZeroTrust]
    
    %% Access Control
    S3Security --> IAM[Security_IntrusionDetection]
    
    %% Network Security
    subgraph "Network Security"
        VPC[Security_Firewall]
        
        PrivateSubnet[Security_ZeroTrust]
        
        SecurityGroups[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        
        NACLs[Security_Encryption]
    end
    
    IAM --> VPC
    VPC --> PrivateSubnet
    VPC --> SecurityGroups
    VPC --> NACLs
    
    %% Application-Level Security
    subgraph "Application Security"
        XSSProtection[Security_Firewall]
        
        SQLInjection[Security_Firewall]
        
        CSRF[Security_Firewall]
        
        FileUpload[Security_ZeroTrust]
    end
    
    SecurityMiddleware --> XSSProtection
    SecurityMiddleware --> SQLInjection
    SecurityMiddleware --> CSRF
    SecurityMiddleware --> FileUpload
    
    %% Monitoring & Detection
    subgraph "Security Monitoring"
        CloudTrail[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        
        GuardDuty[Security_Encryption]
        
        SecurityHub[Security_Encryption]
        
        CloudWatch[Security_Encryption]
    end
    
    IAM --> CloudTrail
    VPC --> GuardDuty
    CloudTrail --> SecurityHub
    GuardDuty --> SecurityHub
    SecurityHub --> CloudWatch
    
    %% Incident Response
    CloudWatch --> SNS[Security_OAuth2]
    
    SNS --> Lambda[Security_ZeroTrust]
    
    %% Data Privacy & Compliance
    subgraph "Privacy & Compliance"
        GDPR[Security_ZeroTrust]
        
        DataRetention[Security_OAuth2]
        
        Encryption[Security_ZeroTrust]
    end
    
    S3Security --> GDPR
    S3Security --> DataRetention
    DataEncryption --> Encryption
    
    %% Security Testing
    subgraph "Security Testing"
        PenTesting[Security_IntrusionDetection]
        
        SecurityTests[Security_Encryption]
        
        ComplianceAudit[Security_Encryption]
    end
    
    SecurityMiddleware --> PenTesting
    SecurityMiddleware --> SecurityTests
    SecurityHub --> ComplianceAudit
    
    %% Backup & Recovery Security
    subgraph "Backup Security"
        BackupEncryption[Security_OAuth2]
        
        DisasterRecovery[Security_Encryption]
    end
    
    S3Security --> BackupEncryption
    BackupEncryption --> DisasterRecovery
    
    %% Styling
    classDef threat fill:#ffcdd2
    classDef protection fill:#c8e6c9
    classDef monitoring fill:#e1bee7
    classDef compliance fill:#bbdefb
    classDef network fill:#dcedc8
    classDef application fill:#ffe0b2
    
    class Attacker threat
    class WAF,CloudFront,ALB,SecurityMiddleware,InputValidation,Authentication protection
    class CloudTrail,GuardDuty,SecurityHub,CloudWatch,SNS,Lambda monitoring
    class GDPR,DataRetention,Encryption,PenTesting,SecurityTests,ComplianceAudit compliance
    class VPC,PrivateSubnet,SecurityGroups,NACLs network
    class XSSProtection,SQLInjection,CSRF,FileUpload application
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
